Name: Amsterdam cheese company
Review Text: This is the cheese-lovers dream place. If you wanna taste a wide range of cheese before buying, this is the place to go!

Name: Amsterdam cheese company
Review Text: If you want to find out about cheese and taste it before purchasing, then there is no better place than this. Staff here explain the cheese, ageing, ingredients and we get to taste it before purchasing. Even they package it based on your â€¦

Name: Amsterdam cheese company
Review Text: Friendly service, great selection and opportunity to taste before purchasing. Purchased a block of 36-month aged Gouda that was to die for! Next stop is the wine store...

Name: Amsterdam cheese company
Review Text: Iâ€™d recommend this place to anyone who loves cheese, they have all kinds of cheese, Iâ€™d personally recommend the Natural Gouda cheese, itâ€™s creamy and very delicious. Also the staff is very kind and friendly. Loved it.

Review Text: Youâ€™ll fine here the perfect cheese. This is the best location in Amsterdam to try different flavors and bring home your favorite one.

Name: Amsterdam cheese company
Review Text: The staff are very kind and helpful, they make you want to stay for more time. I'm not a cheese expert, but I'm sure the products are high quality there.

Review Text: Awesome experience!  We were the only ones in the shop and the staff member was super friendly and helpful.  We had fun with the display cheese wheel too
